version_description:
Dive into a spooktacular Fishdom update!

Let's celebrate Halloween:
- Have fun at the special Halloween event: open treasure chests to get fantastic, valuable gifts!
- Hurry up to get a unique decoration with a freakishly great offer!

New in match-3 mode:
- The new Swapper power-up unlocks at level 25 to let you swap any two pieces on the field!
- Meet friendly Rays that produce electricity you can use to beat the level once you match pieces around them!
- Life Rings always come in handy: simply match pieces next to them to get additional moves or time!

Other features:
- You can now get not only coins, but also diamonds for feeding fish, cleaning the aquarium and completing levels!
- It's easier to keep your aquarium in style with a new Store tab housing special themed decorations for each aquarium
- Your fish have learned new phrases: watch them, because they always have something to say!
- New aquarium: Wild West. Slap on a sheriff's badge and drop by the saloon!
- Enjoy 16 new decorations available at the Store!

We hope you have fun with this update. Happy Halloween!

Dive into a new and amazing Fishdom update!

NEW IN AQUARIUMS:
- A whole new level of underwater ambience: light effects and air bubbles make aquariums more realistic than ever!
- New phrases and tricks for your fish: watch them closely to enjoy all the fun!
- New fish at the Store: Red Cap Oranda and Rainbowfish!

NEW IN MATCH-3 MODE:
- More than 1,400 exciting levels!
- New element: Jerrican with oil—be careful, as oil spills onto neighboring tiles when you match pieces next to it!

One more surprise for you: stickers with your lovely fish available in iOS 10!

We hope you like this update. Stay tuned, as we have more coming!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into an all-new Fishdom update!

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- New aquarium: Russia
- 9 Russian-style decorations
- New fish: Jewelfish and Peppermint Bass

ALSO FEATURING
- Community-requested feature: feel free to rename any of your purchased fish now!
- 60 new match-3 levels!

We hope you enjoy this update!
Have fun playing!

快来体验最新更新！

深海潜水！
- 在七月初与螃蟹赫尔曼开始一场海底冒险！
- 搭深海潜艇穿梭在神秘的海底岩洞寻找宝藏！

三消和水族箱模式
- 琥珀油流到某些关卡了。不用让它再扩散了！
- 注意硬币，你必须让硬币掉到区域底部才能过关
- 解锁美国水族箱，内含 12 个主题装饰物
- 查看商店推出的 2 只新鱼：发光龙和灯泡鱼

希望你喜欢这次更新！
祝你玩得开心！

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a fresh update!

DEEP DIVE!
- Embark on an underwater adventure with Hermann the crab in mid-July!
- Navigate a bathyscaphe through mysterious underwater grottos to find treasure

MATCH-3 AND AQUARIUM MODES
- Amber Sap spilled on some levels. Don't let it spread any further!
- Watch out for Coins, a new element you have to drop down to the bottom of the field to beat levels
- Unlock the USA aquarium with 12 decorations
- Check out 2 new fish at the Store: Glowing Dragon and Bulb fish

We hope you enjoy the update!
Happy gaming!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive for pearls in a new Fishdom update!

PEARL RUSH
- Introducing the first ever pearl diver competition at the end of November!
- Get pearls for Sir Goldflipper's collection to win awesome rewards!

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- 6 themed decorations for the India aquarium
- 2 adorable new fish: Thalassoma Lunare and Ghost Knifefish

ALSO FEATURING
- A new element: find ancient plates buried under water plants to beat levels!
- 6 new achievements for devoted aquarists

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy gaming!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive for pearls in a new Fishdom update!

PEARL RUSH
- Introducing the first ever pearl diver competition at the end of November!
- Get pearls for Sir Goldflipper's collection to win awesome rewards!

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- 6 themed decorations for the India aquarium
- 2 adorable new fish: Thalassoma Lunare and Ghost Knifefish

ALSO FEATURING
- A new element: find ancient plates buried under water plants to beat levels!
- 6 new achievements for devoted aquarists

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy gaming!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Enjoy a festive Fishdom update!

CHRISTMAS MYSTERY
- Celebrate the holiday season in mid-December! Get gifts for every level you beat!
- Collect all 12 holiday decorations to get an Elf fish and a Snowflake fish.

ALSO FEATURING
- A new Fantasy aquarium and 10 custom decorations
- A game birthday surprise in the run-up to Christmas!
- A new element: Mines (match pieces to create a powerful shock wave!)

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy holiday season!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into an all-new Fishdom update!

CAPTAIN'S CHEST
- Meet the old sea dog, Captain Swift, and set sail on a treasure hunt at the end of March!
- Beat levels to open a chest and get awesome rewards!

SPRING ADVENTURES
- Collect Easter eggs in a new event starting at the end of the month!
- Celebrate the holiday by exchanging eggs for unique fish and themed decorations!
- Don't miss Happy Times, a special day when you can get twice as many eggs!

NEW IN MATCH-3
- Catch crabs in new levels!
- Create a shock wave using the Energy Blast power-up!

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- A new Wonderland aquarium and 20 themed decorations!
- 2 new fish: Deissneri and Banggai Cardinalfish.

We hope this update has you swimming for joy!
Enjoy the game!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

A new refreshing Fishdom update, introducing unique fish!
ONE-OF-A-KIND PETS
- Introducing unique fish! Meet an elegant geisha, a brave sheriff, a cunning pirate, and many others!
- Each fish has a unique character. Some like to party, while others like to play ball—get to know them all!
- Vouchers: a new in-game currency you can use to buy unique fish. Beat levels on your first try and take part in events to get vouchers!

NEW IN MATCH-3
- A new element: Bathysphere. Clear the way for in-game elements by removing the pieces below Bathyspheres.
- A new booster: Diving Glove. Use it to make matches by swapping any two adjacent pieces.

NEW IN AQUARIUMS
-A Lost World aquarium and 18 thematic decorations.
- 3 new fish: Killifish, Heckel Discus, and Spotted Pufferfish.

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy gaming!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a new Fishdom update!

AQUATASKS
- Introducing the all-new aquatasks! Complete aquatasks to get boosters, and vouchers that you can use to buy unique fish.
- Choose from lots of tasks: collect pieces, feed fish, activate power-ups—there's something interesting for everyone!

AUTUMN FESTIVAL
- Collect acorns in a new fairytale event! Join in this September!
- Exchange your acorns for thematic decorations to turn your aquarium into a magical forest!
- Adopt new fish! The witty Fox Fish and the shy Autumn Leaf are waiting to meet you.

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- Introducing new unique fish! The Aviator Fish who loves to dream, and The King Fish who is oh-so-charming!
- The new Venice Carnival aquarium and 18 decorations!
- 2 new fish: the Chameleon Botia and Yellow Boxfish.

We hope you enjoy this update!
Have fun this autumn with Fishdom!

Dive into a sunny new Fishdom update!

DAYS OF SUMMER
- Visit the Summer Garden aquarium, your new holiday destination! The event starts on July 17!
- Collect flowers and exchange them for colorful decorations and fish!
- Set up the aquarium by the end of the event to win a special decoration!

VOUCHER HEAP
- Get more rewards for every task you complete starting on July 30!
- Complete all the tasks to get the main prize: a heap of vouchers!

FIRST TEAM EVENT
- Join forces with your teammates in a new event starting on August 2!
- Beat levels as a team and collect crowns to unlock the reward chest!

ALSO
- A new Savanna aquarium and 17 thematic decorations!
- New fish: Athlete Fish, Lemur King, Banded Cichlid, and Ram Cichlid.
- A new element: Water Rocket. Fuel it up to remove an entire row of obstacles!

We hope you enjoy this update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements
Please update the game to the latest version.

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a new Fishdom update!

GO FOR GOLD
- Hermann the crab is inviting you to take part in a tournament! Compete against other players to be the best captain!
- Pilot the bathyscaphe and collect gold bars.
- Top the leaderboard to win the main prize!

NEW IN MATCH-3
- Break the rocks to dig up beautiful Emeralds.
- Help fluffy Seals reach ice holes.
- Collect keys to open Chests with elements you need to beat levels!

ALSO
- New Polar Station aquarium and 17 decorations.
- New fish: Garibaldi, Six-line Wrasse, Harlequin, and a school of kittens.

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Greet Easter with Fishdom's spring update!

EASTER CELEBRATION
- Get ready for Easter with a new holiday aquarium!
- Beautify your new aquarium with holiday decorations to get a surprise gift!
- Meet the Easter fish: Bunny, Yellowtail, and Greentail.

NEW IN AQUARIUM
- The Scene of the Crime aquarium and 17 decorations.
- 4 new regular fish and a new unique Mime Fish.

We hope you'll enjoy this update!
Happy Matching!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

The latest Fishdom update is up and swimming!
QUEST FOR VOUCHERS
- Explore a mysterious cave with Hermann the Crab in the new Gold Voucher Rush event!
- Beat the chains of special levels without losing to unlock chests full of gold vouchers and other prizes!

AQUARIUM AND FISH
- Meet guests from outer space in the new First Contact aquarium!
- Introducing 3 new fish: Dwarf Gourami, Black Lancer, and Carioca Fish, as well as the Dalmatian Family!
- Exchange vouchers for special decorations in the Festivals aquariums!

ALSO FEATURING
- New match-3 element: Rubber Duck Pool. Remove all the ducks from the pool to beat the level.
- Buy unique fish and get diamonds as a gift!

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

The latest Fishdom update is up and swimming!

This update brushes up the aquariums and gets rid of the snow and holiday design. It also comes packed with new fish: Emblemaria and Roving Coral Grouper.

Stay tuned—more is yet to come!

Dive into a sunny new Fishdom update!

DAYS OF SUMMER
- Visit the Summer Garden aquarium, your new holiday destination! The event starts on July 17!
- Collect flowers and exchange them for colorful decorations and fish!
- Set up the aquarium by the end of the event to win a special decoration!

VOUCHER HEAP
- Get more rewards for every task you complete starting on July 30!
- Complete all the tasks to get the main prize: a heap of vouchers!

FIRST TEAM EVENT

- Beat levels as a team and collect crowns to unlock the reward chest!

ALSO
- A new Savanna aquarium and 17 thematic decorations!
- New fish: Athlete Fish, Lemur King, Banded Cichlid, and Ram Cichlid.
- A new element: Water Rocket. Fuel it up to remove an entire row of obstacles!

We hope you enjoy this update!
Have fun playing!

Dive into a new Fishdom update!

CAMPING TRIP
- Set up a Scout Camp aquarium in a new event starting on August 28!
- Collect badges and exchange them for decorations and an adorable Scout Troop!
- Come visit the camp any time after the event is over!

TEAM TOURNAMENT
- Beat levels as a team to win awesome prizes! Join the tournament starting on September 20!
- Make it to the top five to win diamonds for every team member!

ALSO
- Sea Song event starting on September 12! Beat levels without losing to get boosters at the start of every level!
- Meet the new fish: Princess Fish, Speleologist Fish, and Woo Tribe Fish.
- New Crystal Cave aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.

We hope you'll enjoy this update!
Have fun playing!

Dive into a new Fishdom update!

TROUBLE IN PARADISE!
- Help the Tropical Fish plan an amazing party in the Trouble in Paradise event that starts in October!
- Earn special tokens in match-3 levels to get the aquarium ready for the party.
- Complete all of the tasks to keep the Tropical Fish!

HARVEST FESTIVAL
- Collect acorns to decorate the new Autumn Fair aquarium! The event starts in the end of September!
- Meet the charming Autumn Fish.
- Set up the aquarium by the end of the event to win a special decoration and a special background element!

SWEET FEAT
- Complete tasks one by one to win delicious rewards in the event that starts in October!
- Complete all the tasks to get the sweetest prize!

ALSO FEATURING
- A new match-3 element: Safes with Rubies. Make matches next to open Safes to collect Rubies.
- The Mountain Village aquarium and 17 decorations.
- 5 new fish: Tourist Fish, Cheshire Fish, Polar Explorer Fish, Paracheilinus Fish, and Striped Loach.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

Dive into a frosty Fishdom update!

SEASON ADVENTURES
- Complete tasks to get boosters, lives and other prizes!
- Use the Gold Pass to get special rewards, advantages and a unique pet—the Azure Turtle!

CASCADE OF HOLIDAY EVENTS
- Find the Santa's Workshop aquarium with unique decorations and a cute school of fish, Santa and his Reindeer, in the holiday event!
- Complete tasks in the Lunar New Year event to get rewards and win the grand prize—the Panda Fish!
- Even more rewards and vouchers are waiting for you in the New Year's Fever event!

ALSO FEATURING
- A new London Parade aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.
- Three new fish: Fishketeer, Guardsfish, and an Indian dancer.
- A new match-3 element: Ship Wheel. Remove the ropes to beat the level!

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

- A new match-3 element: Ship Wheel. Remove the ropes to beat the level!

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

A romantic Fishdom update!

VALENTINE'S DAY
- Decorate the Dive-in Theater aquarium to watch a movie and earn some boosters!
- Get the cute Love Spirit fish in the Valentine's Day event!
- Earn valentines to buy new decorations in the Romantic Fever event!

THE AQUARIST CLUB
- Earn tokens to help the new characters restore the Aquarist Club.
- Complete all the tasks to keep the restored room!

ALSO FEATURING
- The new Italy Holiday aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.
- One new fish — Great Master.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Get ready for a spring Fishdom update!

HOLIDAY EVENTS
- Get ready for Easter with the new Spring Meadow holiday aquarium.
- Get the cute Spring Beauty fish in the Easter event!
- Win the Leprechaun Fish in the Lucky Streak event on St. Patrick's Day!

THE SECOND SEASON ADVENTURE
- Complete tasks to get boosters, lives, and other prizes!
- Use the Gold Pass to get special rewards, advantages, and unique pets—Celebrity Shark and her pups!

ALSO FEATURING
- The new Mexican Fiesta aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.
- Two new fish: Primeval Chief and Gifted Mariachi.
- New elements: Lava Jars and Frogs.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a colorful Fishdom update!

HOLIDAY EVENTS
- Join the colorful Festival of Colors and get dazzling fish in the Color Town aquarium!
- Complete all the stages of the Flash of Color event to win the Paint Powder Expert!
- Complete all the tasks in the Freedom Festival event to win the Starry Stripy fish!
- Collect special Boat pieces in the Hoist the Sails event to win lots of rewards!

ALSO FEATURING
- The new Artist's Studio aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.
- Two new fish: Flowerhorn and High-Fin Loach.
- A new match-3 element: Whirlpools.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Here comes a magical Fishdom update!

HOLIDAY SEASON
- Join the Holiday Adventures event to meet a cute penguin family.
- Get unique outfits for the penguin family and many valuable rewards with the Gold Pass.
- Enjoy the Winter's Tale event with festive fish.
- Get even more rewards in the Reward Snowfall!

EXCITING ADVENTURES
- Help the Fairytale Trollfish build his dream house to keep the fish in your aquarium!
- Dive for chests and get the Robot Fish in the Adventures Await event.

ALSO FEATURING
- The Miniature Wedding aquarium and 17 thematic decorations.
- Three new fish: Sweet Thumbelina, Pyramid Butterflyfish, and Blue Gourami.
- A new element: Scroll Boxes.

We hope you like the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Get ready for a spring Fishdom update!

NEVER-ENDING CELEBRATION
- Celebrate Royal Easter with a happy merfolk family!
- Beat all the season stages to keep the Fluffy Bunny.

MISTY ISLAND
- Help Captain Crabson find his way through the fogs of the Termuda Triangle.
- Meet Kiki and Captain Crabson's new friend.

TREASURE TIME
- Test out Hermann's new all-terrain vehicle.
- Complete challenges and get the Fish-of-All-Trades.

ALSO FEATURING
- The Arabian Nights aquarium!
- New fish: Fabulous Genie and Longnose Hawkfish.
- New match-3 element: Blowfish.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Have fun playing!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a new exciting Fishdom update!

SEASON ADVENTURES
Have fun with the Squid Squad!
Embark on a culinary adventure with the crocodile chef and his helpers.

GRAND MAKEOVER
- The Lotus Hotel is looking for an experienced designer! Explore the new area together with Jacques and Sophie.
- Help a young witch get ready for her cooking show!

ALSO FEATURING
- The El Dorado Aquarium!
- New fish: The Stargazer Fish, Icefish, and Tireless Adventurer.
- New element: The Winch.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Happy matching!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements
Please update the game to the latest version.

Dive into a new exciting Fishdom update!

SEASON ADVENTURES
Have fun with the Squid Squad!
Embark on a culinary adventure with the crocodile chef and his helpers.

GRAND MAKEOVER
- The Lotus Hotel is looking for an experienced designer! Explore the new area together with Jacques and Sophie.
- Help a young witch get ready for her cooking show!

ALSO FEATURING
- The El Dorado Aquarium!
- New fish: The Stargazer Fish, Icefish, and Tireless Adventurer.
- New element: The Winch.

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Happy matching!

Dive into a head-spinning Fishdom update!
DESERT ESCAPE
- Find out how the Black Oyster crew ended up in the middle of the desert and help them get back to sea!
- Transform a small corner of that sandscape into a lush oasis!

UNLOCK WANDERLUST SEASON
- Help Jacques and Sophie keep an old sea museum from sinking into the past!
- Go hiking on mountain trails with some eager beavers—literally!

ALSO
- Gorgeous flowers in the Hanging Gardens aquarium!
- New fish: the Licorice Gourami, Queen Angelfish, and the Queen of the Gardens!
- New element - Wind-up Toys!

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Happy matching!

What's new:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Dive into a mysterious Fishdom update!
FAMILY ALBUM

- Go back in time and witness Jacques and Sophie's fateful meeting!
- Help the characters organize an oceanography exhibition!

EDGE OF SLEEP

- Join the Master Detective and help Dr. Waterson!
- Explore the world of dreams and hear an underwater lullaby!

ALSO FEATURING

- Discover the majestic statues of Easter Island!
- New fish: Peach Anthias and Red-Bellied Pacu!
- New match-3 element: Coolers!

We hope you enjoy the new update!
Happy matching!

Dive into a magical Fishdom update!
SEASON ADVENTURES
- Follow a secret path to a hidden city. The local nautiluses will happily be your guides.
- Collect a delicious harvest on a farm owned by some cheerful axolotls.

BREAKING THE SPELL
- Help Captain Crabson and Kiki rescue their friend from the clutches of a swamp witch!
- Turn Beast into a charming prince!

ALSO
- New aquarium: Great Wall!
- New fish: Mandarin Dragonet and Velvet Whalefish!
- New elements: Fishing Rod and Cloud Generator!

We hope you enjoy this update!
Happy gaming!

- Bug fixes and improvements
